Daytona_Beach.Port Orange Florida East Coast Railway F: The Port Orange Florida East Coast Railway Passenger and express Depot (also known as the Central Pump & Supply Company) is a historic Florida East Coast Railway passenger depot in Port Orange, Florida, United States. It is located at 415C Herbert Street, off U.S. 1. The station was originally built in 1894, and was used as a flag stop as late as 1961.
